name: Pop 'em!
description:
Wilhem, a guardian of your galaxy has challenged Commander Koch, your instructor to beat his best scores. You, a pilot amongst other pilots have been called upon to help Koch beat Wilhem's challenge. 

Hurry, get on your ship and take down as many ships as you can.

Remember, there are rewards for you.

REWARDS

* USD 74.99 for the first pilot to beat Wilhem's best score.

* USD 49.99 for first runner up.

* USD 24.99 for second runner up.

* USD 9.99 for 997 runners up.

TO CLAIM REWARDS

* You'll be instructed to take a screenshot of a certain page whenever you beat Wilhem's best score.

* Mail the 'screen captured' image to 'sided.dev.team@gmail.com'

PREMIUM FEATURES

* Premium hip

* Bigger Power up

* Bigger score multiplier

WILHEM'S CURRENT BEST SCORE IS 5000 POINTS. BEST SCORES WILL BE UPDATED ON A WEEKLY BASIS.
